long_description: Made with a wide opening for use with rope, the Petzl Oval Screw Link is a compact, lightweight alternative to carabiners for semi-permanent attachments. Constructed of 7mm cadmium steel for a breaking strength of 5,500 pounds. Design to handle multi-directional loads as might be found in rescue situations. Recommended as a lighter and less expensive attachment device for Petzl ascenders or main anchor points. Links are marked with a Normal Working Load, (NWL), which is about 1/5 of their strength.
short_description: Made with a wide opening for use with rope, the Petzl Oval Screw Link is a compact, lightweight alternative to carabiners for semi-permanent attachments.
